title: Revisiting FLSA
summary: The newsletter discusses the revisitation of the Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA) regarding firefighters, focusing on potential exemptions from overtime pay. It examines the application of the 7(k) exemption in cases like Anne Arundel County and evaluates the impact of amendments to FMLA and FLSA regulations.
compressed_content: Main article title: Revisiting FLSA. Focus on revisitation of FLSA with Anne Arundel County case. 7(k) exemption application and potential liability issues. Recent FMLA amendments affecting employee benefits. Sector Boss updates on safety regulations.
search_text: Revisiting FLSA Vol. 3 No. 2 Joseph F. Quinn, Editor: Firehouse Lawyer (3rd Circuit U.S. Court of Appeals) Page 1: Firefighters are engaged in firefighting activities and the discussion continues on whether it is appropriate to consider certain exemptions under the 7(k) exemption.
